website_summaries.verdict: Recognized for its high-quality construction and durability, this reusable microfiber mop will last for years to come.
pros: Handle is adjustable, but mop also comes with an extra extension piece
Mop head rotates 360° for easy reach
cons: Customers complained that the plastic parts of the mop tend to break

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed-breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this 5 stars until it broke. I have a couple that cleans our house weekly so I just needed a mop to clean floors in between weekly cleanings. After a month, I noticed that I had a hard time controlling where the mop went. This mop doesn't go under or behind furniture so there's no real wear and tear but I noticed the green plastic piece at the bottom is broken (as pictured) and I can't use it anymore. Since I can't tighten it, the mop is all over the place. It's unfortunate that it broke this easily. I'm not happy
customer_reviews.author: Flyby

customer_reviews.title: Hooray for Linkyo!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this mop, I was replacing another microfiber mop that I bought through a home representative with Norwex. The replacement mop heads were so expensive for the Norwex that I decided to try a different brand. I also was not happy with the velcro on the Norwex that didn't hold the mop properly and often folded over on itself. Not only is the Lynkyo floor mop as good or better quality microfiber, the system for attaching it to the mop head is genius. No slippage and the mop glides effortlessly over the floor. Hooray for Linkyo!
customer_reviews.author: vickib

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke off after just over a month of use
customer_reviews.text: It was resting on the wall and fell down, and snap the handle broke off from the mop after just over a month of use. Disappointed. See attached photo demonstrating the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Pranjit Deka

customer_reviews.title: Swifter picks up so much after this mop.
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work very well. My 3 year old likes to go behind me and her swifter mop picks up more then this mop with bona spray. Seriously so disappointed. Look at the results between this mop used by an adult and the one pushed by a 3 year old after. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Elderbee

customer_reviews.title: As I'm a puller as well as a pusher I find it useless. Again - it's very well made as far ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very well made. I bought it for laminated floors. It 'pushes' well but flips over on the 'pull cycle. As I'm a puller as well as a pusher I find it useless. Again - it's very well made as far as I can tell - but I only used it for about three minutes. I can never convert to being only a pusher. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Worse than Swiffer
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I waited too long to test if this thing really work since it cleaned the floor but I only see slight dirt on the mop. However, this weekend I decided to use Swiffer after cleaning the floor with this mop it picked up more than this junk. Unfortunately I can't return it now.
customer_reviews.author: Deion Tran

customer_reviews.title: THIS ITEM CANNOT BE RETURNED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy, clunky, and hard to use. The green claws just about took off one of my fingers!!! I just received it today. Packaged it back up exactly as it came. And tried to print off a return slip. YOU CAN'T return the thing!!! I cannot understand all of the good reviews on this item. CraZy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jane alyce

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to rate the LINKYO mop. My first was perfect, still using and working. Over month ago I purchased second one and it's disaster! Two days ago it broke!!! I was mopping the floors and tried to rotate it to clean surface under the radiator and the stick broke!! So dissapointed. It was my third use of that mop. Not saying about flat pink cleaning pod, ripped after second use. Didn't wash it in the washer! Ohh... 😣 It was not intended to me ! 😣
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Does not mop well
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I'm not thrilled with this. Not only does the wand untwist repeatedly while you're dusting or mopping, requiring you to tighten it over and over, it also leaves dirt and water when mopping. I have tried using less water, more water, less pressure when mopping, and there is always a trail of water and dirt left on tile (in the crevices of grout). I have to go back with a towel and soak up the dirty water.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Purchase it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mop as a way to do light mopping. I honestly hated having to bring (and wring) out my big ass mop when I wanted to do a quick clean up. This mop sure did exceed my expectations! With one quick swipe my floors looked drastically cleaner, AND it picked up any pet hair that was left behind by my broom. The only downside was that the mop didn't glide on my floors as much as I would've liked (causing a bit of back strain) but that could've also been due to the type of cleaner I used? Regardless, I'm very satisfied with this mop! (:
customer_reviews.author: Gabbieeee

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan of this mop design.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a year now - i've begun using dish towels folded in half instead of the mop pads because they're easier to clamp to the mop and they dry faster. PROS: - versatile, sturdy - when you're done, you can hang up the wet part and throw the handle back in the closet right away - there's no waste - there's no gross sponge CONS: - they could have made the pads a SMIDGE bigger so they'd be easier to clamp into place
customer_reviews.author: Kryptonite451

customer_reviews.title: Amazon junk.
customer_reviews.text: Used to wipe down floors 2 times before it popped apart! At that point I realized how cheaply It was made. After close examination (upon gathering all the tiny pieces that had popped around the kitchen) it was observed that 2 tiny springs and loose plastic fittings were holding the head of the duster to the rod. If I use again it is very likely it will do the same. It will make a nice addition next to the open cans, used tissues and coffee grounds currently in my trash can. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great idea well executed.
customer_reviews.text: I clean a lot and I hate Swiffers--toxic to pets (liquid related to antifreeze). I like vinegar and water and I like to be able to wash with only slightly damp pads--a lot of water is not useful and terrible for hardwood floors. You can rinse these pats mid use, squeeze them out and reinstall them in the mop base. This mop is a great design, sturdy and larger than you think. Order an extra set of pads--though you could use a large washcloth as well. I have not been as happy with a purchase in a long time. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Forbzilla

customer_reviews.title: best I've found
customer_reviews.text: I have a few rooms of laminate flooring , and this mop is sturdy yet lightweight. I read the reviews and the biggest "draw" for me was that the cleaning head is held in place securely with clips, as I have found mop pads that depend on velcro never quite stay stable and roll at the edges. I am very happy that it came with extra mop pads , which I have successfully washed in gentle cycle in a mesh bag and hung to air dry. All in all , an efficient , well thought out product designed by someone who has actually mopped a floor before. thanks
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: Plastic parts make  a bad mop.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and within 6 months both have broke at tge bottom of the shaft. Won't but another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeepin4eva

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 4 momths
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 4 months and mop head no longer held mop pads on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dalene M. Mcguigan

customer_reviews.title: The best mop ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop so much! So many of the reviews raved about how effective it is and how easy it is to use. I agree. I live in a studio apartment with hard linoleum floor tiles. I needed a mop that wouldn't take up too much space and get the job done. I am so happy with the durability of construction. I often feel like I'll break tools made out of plastic. This is exactly as advertised. Being an environmentalist I'm so happy with the microfiber cloths that I can just throw in the washer with my other towels.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Casto

customer_reviews.title: Love Everything About This Product
customer_reviews.text: Well pleased with this item. I have had things from years ago with a swivel capability and hadn't seen anything like it since. Quality very nice! I am 5'8" and it really is nice having the option of adding an extra length to the handle. I love having the extra clothes to use also, great and smart idea! PS saw someone using a similar item in a hospital room, they have to do a lot of cleaning and guess what, now I have that same quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steel for the same price as plastic.
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a micro fiber floor mop that was made of plastic. Because of the friction created between the mat and the hardwood floor, the connector between the mop and the handle failed, making the mop useless. Looking for a replacement on Amazon, I found this LINKYO, that was priced in the same range as the other one. The price is the only similarity between the two. The LINKYO is exceptionally well designed and made of much better material. As a bonus, the gripping system will allow me to use the pads from the original piece of crap. The pads were the only good thing about the plastic one. Good product, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The best mop on the market today.
customer_reviews.text: I first found this mop for a friend..Her cleaning lady loved it. I then bought one for myself. So much better than bona or swifter. No joke. It has a heavier mop head and the mop pads have scrubbers built in, which is a huge plus. Cleans so much better than the other mops I mentioned. Less dirt left behind. Love Love love this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: GR8 value for a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for only a few days but already I think for the $ this is an excellent mop. Have a couple other swivel-head type dust mops and this one is hands-down superior. Sturdy pole and swivel mechanism, the pole segments fit tight and do not unscrew and the cloth pads are easy to replace and fit securely to the mop head. I'm annoyed that I bought a quickie and a swiffer for as much or more and for much lower quality and performance. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Mikes

customer_reviews.title: Purchased March 2019 - broken, unusable Oct 2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mop when we moved into a new home with hardwood flooring. I bought Bruce Hardwood cleaner and used this mop to clean our floors. I loved that the handle was adjustable and that it came with multiple head covers. I used it possibly 10 times and heard rattling on the inside of the mop head and on closer inspection found that the handle support had cracked as well. My husband took it apart and all of the springs and screws were loose inside the mop head. I thought, at first, it was worth the $25 I spent, but now I'm very disappointed that I'll have to get another, more sturdy, mop for my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V

customer_reviews.title: Best mop ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop. It is easy to use and it works very well at cleaning the floors. I love that the pads are washable and reusable. I had a Swiffer mop before this and I was constantly buying more pads; it was a huge money pit. I really like the length of the mop handle. I'm 5'7 and it is perfect for me with out the extension. The other mop I had was way too short in the handle and I was having to bend constantly to mop. I have had this mop for several months and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I hate mopping, but this makes that chore easier. I like the two-sided cloth pads, one for scrubbing and one for polishing. I use it on my linoleum and laminate floors. I like the "teeth" of the mop head; it holds the pads on securely. I can also used other cloths with the mop head if the original pads are in the laundry. They wash and dry wonderfully, btw; hot water and bleach, no problem. The mop head pivots, so there aren't many places I can't get to. The head is larger than a Swiffer head, so it covers more area. I haven't found anything I don't like about it.....except the actual mopping ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nina Mravlja

customer_reviews.title: The mop to which all others wish they could compare!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I found this! Replacing flimsy Swiffer mop (the cloths would no longer stay on the head). This comes with a few head covers, so they should last a good long time. I just wish I had taken a pic when it was dirty, and then after washing; it was dark gray on the surface that touch the floor (shame on me!), but after washing looked just the unused ones. I used a bit of Clorox Special Care chlorine bleach (doesn't harm fabrics but will remove color/stains) and Persil pod. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the 3rd use!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product until it broke literally the third time I used it. The handle broke off the swivel attachment piece, making it impossible to use. I would NOT recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Best Floor Mop Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is absolutely perfect and so very easy to use. Throughout the years, I have bought many, many other products and they have not come close to the quality of this mop. After using this one for a month, I threw away all of the other ones, completely filling up my trash container. I had a question for the seller and was promptly contacted. Thank you very much for a great product and wonderful service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning windows!
customer_reviews.text: I've just had this a short while but need to share something....I use a regular large microfiber cloth, folded, on this mop for cleaning WINDOWS! We have many large windows and in between regular cleaning this mop works great. I add a bit of Dawn to water, moisten the microfiber cloth, wring it out, fold it and place and secure it on the mop head. I haven't tried this with the thicker cleaning pads that came with the mop but that probably will work too.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: All floors wet & dry, long handle!
customer_reviews.text: I have real hardwood upstairs and laminate in the basement. I can sweep with this, change the pad, then clean the hardwood (I reccomend Method Almond Hardwood Cleaner) and then I can change the pad again and mop the laminate. It does a great job at picking up everything and I absolutely LOVE the 6' handle. I am 5'9" and for the first time ever, I didnt have to hunch over to reach every spot on the floor! So much nicer on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased some lower priced mops from other sellers that were absolute junk. This LINKYO Microfiber mop is sturdy and does the job! Works on all sorts of floors Well worth the price. Don't waste your time or money with some of the cheaper mops, this one will last you years.
customer_reviews.author: Summit Safety Technologies

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and easy to use mop; however, the "adjustable" length in its description, is actually only two lengths, , short and long; for me, 5'10", long was fine, but it would be better if adjustable meant really adjustable....just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: David Vilkomerson

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick mop of a laminate floor.
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job of surface cleaning but my wife says using an old fashion mop does a better job. The cloth mop pad could be about 1/2" wider, as it is you have to align the pad carefully in order for the snap down holder to get it held down right, this has to be done carefully so you don't snap it down on your fingers as it has plastic spikes. We use it with a spray laminate cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Guy

customer_reviews.title: Must remove pad from mop to wring dry.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this mop because of the large surface area of the mop head. My excitement turned to disappointment when I realized that in order to clean a large surface, i must remove the mop pad to clean, hand-wring, and then reattach it. I purchased this mop mainly to clean my vinyl tile floor. I use very hot water so when I realized that I have to manually remove the pad in order to wring it dry, it lost it's appeal. I still use it but I will be searching once again for something that is self cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: RJFL

customer_reviews.title: LYNKO Microfiber floor mop....very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I havn't used this LInkyo Microfiber mop yet but I love the sturdiness of how it is made and being able to wash the cloths and use over again. I have used the Swiffer for my floors for years but it gets costly to have to continuously replace the pads. I'm really looking forward to using my new mop as I have all wood floors. Another great thing is it can be used to dust floors as well. The price was great and I'm happy with my purchase 😊 I also love that the pads are Microfiber...can't beat it!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this mop once. I love it. I use it on my vinyl linoleum floors. I use a bucket with cleaning product and have to remove the pad to ring out each time. That can be a little inconvenient, but I have used a traditional mop all my life and do not gross out with these kinds of things. Works great at washing walls too. Won’t scratch either your floors or walls. After mopping I just removed the pad and through it in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Retiredarmymom

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I had hope for more of a quality floor mat which isn’t what I experienced. It wasn’t a sturdy pole to put together. The pole wasn’t durable & I didn’t foresee it lasting long. The cloths didn’t stay on easy & weren’t of quality either to withstand washing. I didn’t proceed in using it. I don’t know if mine was poorly made but an unfortunate experience therefore I retuned it.
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the surface, picks up dirt, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I did the web research. I can't believe organizations review floor mops, but it really helped me narrow down the purchase. Minimal plastic parts, easy to put together, effective on the floor cleaning aspect, and the swivel gets EVERYWHERE. This makes a nasty job easy and quick. I use it for tile floors, and will use it for hardwood with a special cleaner. I am not looking forward to sticking this filthy mop cover in my washer.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy Queen

customer_reviews.title: Unable to wring out
customer_reviews.text: I love the reusability of this mop, but there are some design challenges: - There is no way to wring out water. I ended pulling the microfiber part of the mop along the side of my mop bucket to push out excess water prior to mopping. It wasn’t perfect but better than the design - Due to the inability to effectively wring out excess water, the maneuverability sucked. I had to push down on the handle to ensure the large flat portion would stay on the floor instead of flipping 90-degrees onto the side - Based on availability of reusable products, I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: J. Dronenburg II

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, works well
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how well it would work if you have a lot of heavy duty cleaning needs, but this works great if you just wanted to do a quick wipe down of the kitchen floor with all the rigmarole of filling a bucket and wringing out a mop, etc. The cloths clamp on tightly and securely and I love that I won't have to keep buying new heads for the mop like with my old sponge style.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty, high quality product
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a Bono set that the handle was wearing out. First off, this is a whole different league. This is a heavy duty piece of equipment. It feels solid, and durable. The clamping mechanism for the mop head is secure. It comes with several heads. This is really designed for something much more intense than home use. I cannot imagine I will ever actually wear it out. I also really like the extra long handle. I am 6ft and while I did not need it, I find it be wonderful. One of the first thing I did was use a dry midcro-fiber cloth to dust several very high walls that we never get to.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: The mop looks quite study and heavy hope it's going to last me long enough. Maneuvering is quite easy despite relatively being heavy for it's size. Comes with two additional Microfiber Cloths which is great, I also like the fact that down the road I can use any other microfiber cloth. Overall for this price range, I think it's a great product, I just hope it will last me long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: A very good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using the product to clean my floors. I haven’t not used it as a dusting product. I fill a sprayer with half water and vinegar. Cleans floors well and the floor is shiny after. I like the fact that that you can just throw the pads in the washer when they get dirty. No longer wringing a mop. The product is easy to assemble and a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hauptfleisch

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy but nice!
customer_reviews.text: I just unboxed and put it together last night, I haven’t used it yet. It comes with a variety of cleaning cloths which is great. It also comes with an extra piece for handle if you’re a taller person. But it is very heavy. In the description it says heavy duty and it is, but if you’re a small person don’t buy it. It’s just too heavy for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works Well on My Hardwood Floors
customer_reviews.text: Been using this mop at least 6 months. Really like the versatility it offers. I can dust mop or damp mop with it and switch between the two easily, it reaches well under my bed and most furniture with legs. Really convenient to be able to throw pads in washer for easy cleaning and good that it has a hook to hang when storing away. The only complaint is that there isn't a clip to secure the pad in a vertical position to the pole for storing.
customer_reviews.author: Mixdplate

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 yrs ago. I drop it on the floor and bang it against furniture all the time but it's still working like the day I bought it. I specifically looked for a mop w metal parts, an effective pad system, and generic pads that are easy to replace. No elastic or velcro to wear out. I use it as a wet mop and the white pad is great for giving my hardwood and tile floors a quick once-over after vacuuming. The microfiber is absorbent and picks up a lot of dirt. Wish it came with more refills but tbh I havent even worn through my first pad. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PURCHASE - Don’t buy it - scam
customer_reviews.text: I’ve just tried to use this - I wanted to return it, I now see it’s not returnable. 🧐 The connection pipes don’t say screwed together and there’s no way to squeeze out the mop, & also no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Cocohat

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: In the little more than two weeks we've been using the floor mop we have found it to be excellent in a number of ways: We use it as a light scrubber for laminate floors, as a finish (wax?) spreader, and as a dust mop. The fastening system makes it so easy to change pads as well as using other materials. We use two 'swiffer' sheets placed over a microfiber cloth for dust mopping and the extension handle really helps getting under beds and couches on hardwood floors. We really like this floor mop and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Hard to please....

customer_reviews.title: A very sturdy mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop is very strong and will not break for years if at all. It comes with extra pads that hold firmly in place and are also well made. Its a bit heavy for me but that is more because of my size, its nice to know that it will not break instantly as many mops do now. The price is affordable and the company contacted my right away to see if it arrived on time and if I liked the mop, that alone is a mop seller plus. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: hulalou

customer_reviews.title: Quality Floor Mop
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of the handle and mop head. Attaching the mop pad is an easy and durable process. I would have given this a five star rating but I just received it and have not mopped my floor. Very impressed with the sturdy handle (the reason I bought it) and the fact that it has an extension rod on it for tall people. I am 5'8" and don't need the extension.
customer_reviews.author: Janette R.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and was so excited to open it. It was easy to assemble and comfortable to hold. Let me tell you. This thing glides across my vinyl floors like a dream!! I vacuumed first then used the green pad for dust mopping. I mixed 1 gallon of hot water and 1 cup apple cider vinegar and it made my floors sparkle. It maneuvered and went under everything I needed to. Buy this mop. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaning tool!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is great. I have laminate pretty much throughout my home. The clamp to secure the microfiber sheet is really strong. The sheets wash easily and come out clean every time. The pole is really thick and sturdy, I never feel like if I scrub and put too much pressure that I could break it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: But this mop...
customer_reviews.text: This mop is awesome! Probably the best mop I’ve ever owned. It’s almost as good and sturdy as, if not more than a professional mop. It’s easy to use as well. I’ve tried several mops that have reusable heads and sometimes getting the pad on and off is a nightmare. Especially when wet. I just fill up a sink with hot water, soak the pad, wring it out, lay it on the floor, set the mop on top and adjust it, lock the teeth and mop away. Would definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: hollowleg911

customer_reviews.title: strong mop, but attaching cloths is a pain
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good mop like my Rubbermaid one which seems to have been discontinued. My main desire was for a strong handle - not plastic or aluminum. This mop has that, so that's why I give the 3 stars. However, I miss the ease of the velcro cloth pads (and you could use many manufacturer's cloths). Getting this mop pad in place then closing the plastic "clamps" without getting your fingers trapped in it is a real pain (sometimes literally).
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stanek

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It took a little getting used to, as its bigger and heavier than the Swiffer I was using, but I am so glad I switched. I wanted to reduce the waste I was producing using the disposable pads for the swiffer, and found the swiffer pad scent a bit overwhelming. Now I can use a biodegradable cleaner I like, with no residue. The Microfiber pads are easy on and easy off, and wash beautifully. I would highly recommend this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: The concept is great
customer_reviews.text: The mop concept and quality of pads are great. The problem is that the mop design is not good. I had the mop for at least 8 months and only used it periodically on my hardwood floors. The mechanism that holds the mop pad in place is made of plastic. A portion of that mechanism broke and leaves me with no way to hold the pad in place. 😭😭
customer_reviews.author: carole anderson

customer_reviews.title: I do not work
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks ago I received LINKYO Floor Mop which I have tested in different circumstances and it has not worked for me, I used it dry and if it raises a bit of dust but still has to use other appliances, use it wet, as a mop and it does not stop clean, always remain dirt debris which does not comply with what promises, does not lift all the dirty and does not leave completely clean, practically a triple work is done with different instruments to do what LINKYO "Promises".
customer_reviews.author: dB Shopping

customer_reviews.title: This mop is amazing! We used it on our kitchen floor that ...
customer_reviews.text: This mop is amazing! We used it on our kitchen floor that has old vinyl flooring. Our other mop has never gotten the floor really clean but this mop made it look fantastic! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I wish it had a telescoping handle. The segments that can be added/removed are nice but I can't get it to quite the right length to be really comfortable. Other than that, I am totally loving this mop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is great, but this hardly picks up any dirt.
customer_reviews.text: I feel bad with the poor review that I left before as I just realized that I wasn't using it properly. I did not have the additional pad on underneath. I will try it again and leave another review.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: No thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this but it was a disappointment. All it took was 1 use. I would return it but the return window has passed. It super heavy (a whole workout for your arms) and bottom portion moves/turns way to much. I get that’s the purpose but if I’m mopping in a straight line it turns out of nowhere. I will be counting this as a lost and throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: The unit is well made and should last a long time if used properly. The pads work great on vinyl plank floor picking up dirt and grime. The handle is multiple sections but everything goes together easily and seems solid. It isn't indestructible but should last a very long time if used properly.
customer_reviews.author: Boss Hog

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS EASILY
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered four of these. The first time, it was unbelievable, I loved it. For the other three times, the mop broke within a couple of uses. The only reason I gave it so many more trials is because how amazing it was the first time around.
customer_reviews.author: Brinda Modi

customer_reviews.title: The warranty is Honored
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to work with, but it broke within 2 weeks of use. I used it at work have to change towels often . The plastic that holds the springs broke off $25 this mop is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolf

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Well no instructions how to assemble and the mop head does not stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: ChiBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in Feb/2019 and it broke down very soon after several uses. The head is very easily detached from the handle and it's hard to maneuver. We've been just dealing with this issue and now the handle is completely broke so will buy a new one. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yusu liu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect alternative to swiffer, does a much better job at holding the dust and the pads are washable. The head is large, maneuvering is very good, but tight spots are a challege - but expected. The pole is very sturdy, a major upgrade from the flimsy swiffer pole - so the job is easier. I strongly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Daniele

customer_reviews.title: Strong and worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is so much sturdier than the ones purchased in discount stores. I also love that the cloths are nice and thick and clamp in. The microfiber cloths for other mops lose their 'stickiness' and then won't stay on the mop. It is also nice that the handle can be adjusted to different lengths. I love that the set includes extra cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Y

customer_reviews.title: Favorite mop so far
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop! Works great. Convienent. I just spray floor with pinesol or whatever, let it set a few minutes and clean up. It's also very sturdy. I have broke other mops, similar to this, with vigurous mopping. This one has held up and I think it will for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Large, busy family

customer_reviews.title: This worked wonderfully and was so nice to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use with Weidman floor polish. This worked wonderfully and was so nice to use. I usually do my floors on my hands and knees but this was SO much easier and had beautiful results. I like that it comes with additional pads, I assume I will need to purchase additional pads after some use. Definitely a great purchase and better than the options I have seen in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: The mop is excellent as well and whatever is left behind after sweeping ...
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked very well cleaning up after my two dogs. It gets every piece of fuzz and hair off my floors if I use a zig zag approach. The only issue is getting all the hair and dirt off the mop into the trash! It's kind of gross that I have to use my fingers to pull off the hair & dirt off the duster. The mop is excellent as well and whatever is left behind after sweeping is quickly picked up.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Making life better
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwood floors and this works beautifully. We have used ones made by Swiffer, Liberman, and Bruce. This product is the best by far. Pads are well made and the mop is very strong and does not bend or come unattached. Wonderful product thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well, cannot return
customer_reviews.text: This mop does not work well on dirty floors. It is not easy to maneuver and the mop portion keeps flipping over. I was interested in trying it because you can clip any cloth on, but I was very unhappy with how it moved on my hardwood floors. When I tried to return it, I was dismayed to find that returns are not accepted. Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CaliforniaBear

customer_reviews.title: It broke too fast
customer_reviews.text: I picked this one because the clasps let me use any kind of fabric to mop the floor. I was happy with my purchase until it broke. Good concept but not strong enough made. It started to make a weird noise so I opened it up and found out that little pin that holds the string broke, so now it doesn’t hold anything up.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Marta Pacheco Nemes

customer_reviews.title: Not a time
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I really dislike to wash those nasty filthy microfiber pads in the washer. I realized how many times I have washed those dirty pads comparing to Swiffer pads that can be thrown away and not worrying about using that much water from washing. I don't think LINKYO mop is a money saver since how often you have to wash its pads. So I went back using my Swiffer mops (both sweeper and wet jet) which I love. These items are way better than this LINKYO mop. It's too late for me to return this LINKYO mop.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Mop broke after second use!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mop broke after used twice and is not returnable! Cannot believe this was ever $50
customer_reviews.author: LittlemrsC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for mopping tile floor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop for tile floors, does a great job while mopping. My only wish is the ability to squeeze out a little extra water. Coming out of the pail it is dripping unless running hand down the surface before starting to mop. After completing the mopping it would be nice to squeeze out all the excess water. For this reason will give it 4 star rather then 5.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Back Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable mop. Heavier than I thought it would be. Nice that you get extra pads. Before I use it, I swiffer the floor first to get up the dog hair. The head swirls easily. I have just used warm water and usually rinse out the pad three times so I am not just pushing a dirty pad around. Probably would not be good on a rough surface. For the price, I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Big Sculpin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I got this, very good quality and its so easy to use and perfect for quick clean ups it moves so easily over the floors since on most days when I have time I usually use my steam mop, but on some days when I don't have much time I just use this real quick! the only complained I would have is that I wish they would give you a better deal for the refills ...3 extra pads for 14.99.- is a little high, other than that is a prefect tool for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Good mop
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an easy to use mop I could attach a normal kitchen towel to and quick mop with water. This is perfect. It holds my towels and the pads it came with tightly. They're quick and easy to attach and remove. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C. RHODES

customer_reviews.title: I really like this mop system.
customer_reviews.text: Late addition: this would be awesome with a roller to roll out excess water. It could clip to the handle. I don't want to sound weird or anything, but I'm kind of enjoying mopping. We've been doing a lot of outdoor work, and it's hard to avoid tracking in grit. I really like this. Can't explain it.
customer_reviews.author: M23669

customer_reviews.title: Best Mop Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I had another mop similar for about 7 years, It finally broke, done. Was going to order one like I had until I saw this one. I ordered this one by LINKYO well, this sure is an amazing well made excellent quality mop. I love the way the mop cloths adhere to the unit. I can truly see this mop lasting a lifetime. The mop heads are of excellent quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: DavesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Much better than swifer.
customer_reviews.text: I have 1860 sq ft to clean and this makes the job a little easier. I had hope (unrealistic hope) that I would not have to deal with streaks but reality is hard to beat. This unit is sturdy so no worries breaking it. You can actually scrub with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim James

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The product came missing a portion of the metal handle; it’s three parts (A - top of handle, B - mid handle, and C - lower handle that joins to mop head). I received two “A” handles and a “C” handle, no “B” portion of the handle. Frustrating to now have to deal with a return.
customer_reviews.author: sojourner75

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought more as gifts!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this mop and its resuable mop heads that I bought two more as gifts! The ability to flip the mop covers and also run them thru the washer is a true bonus. The mop head is very flexible and easily rotates to reach difficult corners and angles. I also really like the basic design that enabled me to clamp on a chamois to dry and polish some highly reflective varnished floors before they dried naturally. I highly recommend this product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Great Mop!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase! I got it to use primarily on my hardwood floors. It comes with 2 types of cloths, one for deep cleaning and the other for dusting or buffing with HW spray to make them shine. I like to extra handle extension since I'm tall. The extra wide mop head is definitely another plus. Tomorrow I'm going to clean the kitchen and bathroom floors with it. I just tossed the cloths in the washer and their ready to reuse. Also, you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Marie

customer_reviews.title: very poor
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very poor. The shelves on the second side of the shelf can't be used for cloth clamping in less than a month. Very, very, very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: but love that it's not disposable
customer_reviews.text: Everything you want and expect from this mop! Haven't had it long enough to reap the benefits of the washable pads, but love that it's not disposable. The mop handle is sturdy, attractive and quite long at full extension. We installed a floating floor, shiny white...this is very handy maintaining it's appeal. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rust easily
customer_reviews.text: The snaps don't seem to hold the microfiber clothe very well. Had to keep on checking to make sure the cloth doesn't slip out. Also the handle rusts very easily like in 2 weeks if you don't take care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I received this mop a few days ago and couldn't wait to give it a try! It was super easy to put together, and equally as easy to use. Sturdy - not flimsy or cheap. I haven't used any cleaners, other than water, on our newly installed LVT floor. I don't want to, if I don't have to. This mop is perfect for 'just water' cleaning! My next test will be on the wood laminate. I have not tried it dry yet. But I am certain I won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Laidler

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to use
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I missed the time to return I took to long to open the box. It doesn't glide as I am used to you have to put effort into it to mop. Not bad quality but can not use at all! Will go to garbage
customer_reviews.author: Nokia fan

customer_reviews.title: Just a terrific mop!
customer_reviews.text: This a an amazing hard surface mop. It reminds me of some of the commercial ones I've seen. The pads wash easily and they interchange on and off the mop easily too. Much better that the disposable swiff brand one. Better Job too. Get a couple pads and you're set. Cleans up well after the dogs and wet weather
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and comes with extra pads!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is very study. The pads are thick and it comes with extra ones. The material they use is easy to clean and the dirt comes out of it very well so you can just run some water over it, spray a little bleach on it and it stays nice and white. It's awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S

customer_reviews.title: Very good and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The pads are strong. I've had it for a while and haven't had to open the second one yet. It works well. It takes some effort (like any mop of this kind) to put the pads on tight so that they don't flop around loosely
customer_reviews.author: melinda15

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: This was a housewarming gift for my daughter. She really likes it. Her only observation was that she has to take the pad off, rinse it and put it back on about 3x because her whole house is wood flooring. She doesn't like handling the filthy pad. But otherwise she really likes it. And loves that she doesn't have to go buy new pads, machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Swiffer! I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mop that I’ve had for almost 3 years. I will never buy another after using this one. I had a Swiffer Wetjet before and it was nice until I realized how much refills were costing. This is so much simpler and when my husband and I installed our snap wood floors the Swiffer was useless. I love how maneuverable it is, light and how the pads actually stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Whitebread

customer_reviews.title: Best mop!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this mop. If you have ever struggled with the Velcro kind your prayers have been answered they gripping teeth are genius! Hands down worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Its ease to use and the pads are washable by machine or hands!
customer_reviews.text: All the parts are well made. It comes in four sections (A, B, C & F); just the bottom section would allow you to clean under the tables, chairs and off the floor sink cabinets; the “F” section allow you to reach an eight feet ceiling easily. The mop pads are washable so it’s economical as well as ecological. The mop is very easy to put together and use. I recommend this mop!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a mop and bucket, better than any mop I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Well made, smart design, easy to use and you can change out and launder the "mop" part. Love it. Most of the stuff out there is junk compared to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Poliat

customer_reviews.title: I really like this one
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional cleaner, own my own business, had used a number of differ mops. I really like this one, it has a nice weight to it. the full length of the handle is great, makes it easy to dry mop under king size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Hampshirecastle

customer_reviews.title: Ok for household with hardwood floor
customer_reviews.text: It made my household chores easier and saved my time. I should have bought this kind of stuff earlier. It was ok but should be careful with handle. otherwise it might break easily if you are rough with it
customer_reviews.author: Isaura

customer_reviews.title: Designed by someone who actually cleans - probably
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mop I have used - ever. Since I have always been the "cleaner" in the house, both living at home and married, I have used all kinds of mops. This one is great, it must have been designed by someone who actually cleans. It fits perfectly behind the toilet in the hard to clean area between the base and the wall, it is adjustable so I am not stooped over when I mop and the pads are easy to use and then just throw them in the wash. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: AD

product_meta.title: LINKYO Microfiber Hardwood Floor Mop with 3 Flat Mop Pads, Stainless Steel Handle and Extension
feature_bullets: Professional Quality: Our floor mop is built to last with durable stainless steel handle, aluminum mop frame, and high grade ABS plastic.
Adjustable Handle: Included extension piece extends up to 70" providing long reach for high corners and deep under furniture
Easy Maneuvering: 360 degree rotating 14.75" metal mop frame with easy clip design, perfectly sized for both home and office use
Bonus Microfiber Cloths: Includes 2x reversible microfiber mop cloths and 1x standard microfiber mop pad. All machine washable for multiple reuse

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,314 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Handle Extension, Extra Microfiber Mop Pads
